org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning
Class PersistentMachineDetails

java.lang.Object
  org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning.MachineDetails
      org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning.PersistentMachineDetails
All Implemented Interfaces:
Externalizable, Serializable
public class PersistentMachineDetails
extends org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning.MachineDetails

An extension of Machine Details that is safe to use with the SpaceDocumentConverter. Any properties that cannot be safely serialized will be nulled out and replaced with appropriate safe fields.

Since:
2.7.0
Author:
barakme
See Also:
Serialized Form

Method Detail

populateFromMachineDetails

public void populateFromMachineDetails(org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning.MachineDetails md)
Populates the fields of the current object from the given MachineDetails. Note that all copy operations are shallow. Unsafe properties will be replaced.

Parameters:
md - the machine detaions to copy.

toMachineDetails

public org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning.MachineDetails toMachineDetails()
Creates a new machine details object from the current persistent details. Unsafe properties are re-created.

Returns:
the machine details.
